lines: 1. I've wandered far away from God, Now I'm coming home; The paths of sin too long I've trod; Lord, I'm coming home.
Refrain : Coming home, coming home Nevermore to roam; Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm coming home.
2. I've wasted many precious years, Now I'm coming home; I now repent with bitter tears; Lord, I'm coming home.
3. I'm tired of sin and straying Lord, Now I'm coming home I'll trust Thy love, believe Thy word Lord, I'm coming home.
4. My only hope, my only plea, Now I'm coming home That Jesus died, and died for me; Lord, I'm coming home.
5. I need His cleansing blood I know, Now I'm coming home; O wash me whiter than the snow; Lord, I'm coming home.
